title: About GUTTER SHARE COMPANY
subtitle: Established April 11, 2005
description: A trusted business organization serving Ethiopia since 2005

leftContent.title: Who We Are
leftContent.description: Gutter Share Company is a leading business organization established in 2005, strategically located in the heart of Addis Ababa near Piassa. We specialize in commercial real estate services and international trade, providing comprehensive solutions to businesses across Ethiopia.

rightContent.title: What We Do
rightContent.intro: We offer a wide range of services from our prime location in Addis Ababa:
